text:
San Francisco / Remote (US / International):

Rainforest QA (YC S12) is hiring for most roles; developers backend (rails / go / elixir), frontend (react), data science, also sales (AE/SDRs), plus marketing.

Fast and simple QA, Rainforest automates your functional and integration testing with our QA-as-a-Service API. Human testing at the speed of automation.

Learn more: https://www.rainforestqa.com/jobs/

Russ

The company you keep: https://medium.com/@juliandoesstuff/the-company-you-keep-f68...
